localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Stay organized and social with Gamelib ~ Store your games in libraries, log playthroughs to your diary, rate and review games, follow friends, create custom ranked/unranked lists, see upcoming and popular games, and more.
blogPost.body: Stay organized and social with Gamelib ~ Store your games in libraries, log playthroughs to your diary, rate and review games, follow friends, create custom ranked/unranked lists, see upcoming and popular games, and more.
blogPost.title: Gamelib 2.0 - Keep track of, discover and socialize about games.
blogPost.author: Benjamin Akar

localize.description: 使用Gamelib保持组织和社交~将你的游戏存储在游戏库中，将游戏的玩法记录到你的日记中，对游戏进行评分和评论，关注朋友，创建自定义的排名/未排名列表，查看即将到来的和流行的游戏，等等。
使用Gamelib保持組織和社交~將你的遊戲存儲在遊戲庫中，將遊戲的玩法記錄到你的日記中，對遊戲進行評分和評論，關注朋友，創建自定義的排名/未排名列表，查看即將到來的和流行的遊戲，等等。

previous.excerpt: Jel is the video game for work. Jel is a collaboration tool designed for teams who also play games. Speak naturally as avatars, without using your camera. Jel is the always-on video game you can use all day with your team to hang out or get stuff done.
previous.title: Jel - The video game for work.

localize.description: 杰尔是工作的电子游戏。Jel是一款为同样玩游戏的团队设计的协作工具。作为虚拟人物自然地说话，而不使用你的相机。Jel是一款永远在线的视频游戏，你可以和你的团队一起使用一整天来闲逛或完成事情。
傑爾是工作的電子遊戲。Jel是一款爲同樣玩遊戲的團隊設計的協作工具。作爲虛擬人物自然地說話，而不使用你的相機。Jel是一款永遠在線的視頻遊戲，你可以和你的團隊一起使用一整天來閒逛或完成事情。

比特幣突破55000美元，目前總市值已超過1萬億美元。$BTC https://t.co/j8L7BDw2Dg
